greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter-sequence related to base-2 run length encoding: a(n) = A046523(A075159(1+n)) = A046523(1+A075157(n)).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..16384
program: A005811(n) = hammingweight(bitxor(n, n>>1));  \\ This function from _Gheorghe Coserea_, Sep 03 2015
A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ This function from _Charles R Greathouse IV_, Aug 17 2011
xref: Cf. A046523, A075157, A075159, A286617 (rgs-version of this filter).
Other base-2 related filter sequences: A278219, A278222.
Sequences that partition N into same or coarser equivalence classes are at least these: A092339, A227185.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 16 2016
